monsters.name: Count Drunkula
monsters.description: An aristocratic vampire with a dramatic flair.
starting_dialogue: I am Count Drunkula. But you probably know this already..
You really need to get out more.. I'm the talk of all of Transylvania!
You've never BEEN?? Don't you MageTenders get vacation days??
Whatever. Count Drunkula is the name. And in case it isn't obvious..
Anyways, barkeep, give me a brew... that would make the man on the moon's blood curdle!
satisfied_dialogue: Ah yes... this hits the spot! Blood-curdling taste... just the way I like it!
I've always walked pass this tavern, never bothered to come in..
Count Drunkula will be returning in the future!
What's that? Why do I refer to myself in third-person?
angry_dialogue: Wha- what is this?? I asked for a brew that would make the man on the moon's blood curdle!
Are you making a mockery of me? Have you tried to POISON COUNT DRUNKULA??
neutral_dialogue: Not bad... not quite to my liking either.
Perhaps I underestimated you BarTender... but not by much.
